name: Post messages to Slack
description: Post messages to Slack for each activities from your site
author: Restya
settings_description:
Register a new application in Slack in this URL https://api.slack.com/applications/new with providing below details,
App Name: ##SITE_NAME##
Short Description: Give some description about your site
Describe what your app does on Slack (3-5 sentences): Give some description about what your app does on Slack
Redirect URI(s): ##SITE_URL##/plugins/r_slack/login.html
